#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef vector<vector<int> > VVI;

const int MOD = 1e9 + 7;
int A[100];

#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define LL long long
inline LL inp() {
  char c = gc();
  while(c<'0' || c>'9') c = gc();
  LL ret = 0;
  while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
    ret = (ret << 3) + (ret << 1) + c - 48;
    c = gc();
  }
  return ret;
}

void fib(LL n, int &x, int &y) {
	LL f = n;
	int i;
	for(i=0; f>0; i++) {
		A[i] = (f&1); f>>=1;
	}
	i--;

	int prev=0; int pres=1;
	while(i--) {
		int temp = pres;
		pres = ((prev*1ll*2 + 1ll*pres) * 1ll * pres) % MOD;
		prev = (prev*1ll*prev + temp*1ll*temp) % MOD;
		if(A[i]) {
			swap(prev, pres);
			pres += prev;
			if(pres >= MOD)
				pres -= MOD;
		}
	}
	x=prev; y=pres;
}


int main() {
	LL t;
	t = inp();
	while(t--) {
		LL n;
		n = inp();
		if(n==0){
			printf("0\n");
			continue;
		}
		int x,y;
		n <<= 1;
		fib(n, x, y);
		int ans = ((x+y) * 1ll * y) % MOD;
		printf("%d\n", ans);
	}
}
